shortdesc.ph: Reports events for preloading music resources.

public abstract void OnPreLoadEvent(string requestId, long songCode, int percent, string lyricUrl, PreloadState state, MusicContentCenterStateReason reason);

section.p: After you call the method to preload music resources, the SDK triggers this callback.
